content: Thanks for the awesome article dude! I just started playing this last night and am thoroughly hooked. So simultaneously engrossing and wholesome/lighthearted — a pretty rare combo in games lately. One minor thing you may want to fix: when you were talking about the psychological idea of Flow, you said, “When the task is easy but the skill level required is high, people become bored.” — I think it should state that when the task is easy but the skill level you HAVE is high, you become bored (rather than the skill level required).
